Interface VisualDABSlideShow

    Visual

extends Visual

      • getCategoryText

        java.lang.String getCategoryText()
        Returns the category description of this VisualDABSlideShow. Only applicable for a DAB Categorized Slideshow (check 'isCategorized()')
        Returns:
        the category text or an empty String if it's not a categorized VisualDABSlideShow

      • getCategoryId

        int getCategoryId()
        Returns the category id of this VisualDABSlideShow. Only applicable for for a DAB Categorized Slideshow (check 'isCategorized()')
        Returns:
        the category id or '-1' if it's not a categorized VisualDABSlideShow

      • getLink

        java.net.URI getLink()
        Returns the link associated with this VisualDABSlideShow. Only applicable for for a DAB Categorized Slideshow (check 'isCategorized()')
        Returns:
        the link associated with this VisualDABSlideShow or an empty String

      • getClickThroughUrl

        java.net.URI getClickThroughUrl()
        Returns the click through link associated with this VisualDABSlideShow. Only applicable for for a DAB Categorized Slideshow (check 'isCategorized()')
        Returns:
        the click through link associated with this VisualDABSlideShow or an empty String
